archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_0721
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a simple business owner, when you have relevant data about me or my business, I want you to use that information to proactively help me be better at running my business, so that I can concentrate on the important things and enjoy a better quaity of life.

properties.value: Very generic, details to be discussed. Dedicated session Enterprise Portal

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
